function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited national reception of WBE in the U.S. for Covid-19 tracking","Impact":"Ineffective monitoring of Covid-19 spread and prevalence in the U.S.","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and advocacy for WBE in the U.S. at a national level","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"General public, government, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of interest from state and federal governments in the U.S.","Impact":"Limited implementation of WBE for Covid-19 tracking at a large scale","Mitigation":"Educate and engage government officials about the benefits of WBE for Covid-19 tracking","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"Government officials, policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Delay in U.S. federal agencies' interest in WBE for Covid-19 tracking","Impact":"Delayed adoption of an effective tool for Covid-19 monitoring and surveillance","Mitigation":"Advocate for the use of WBE and its potential impact on public health at federal agencies","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE)","People":"CDC, EPA, public health officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, advocacy groups"}]}
